title: LF someone to smurf with
body:
Just looking for someone to smurf with, just for fun, not actually looking to climb or anything
just to play unconventional picks and fun builds, can't do it on my main cause I'll drop ranks like a sack of potatoes 
so thinking of doing it on a smurf, but would also want to do these fun comps with someone else as well

Add my main Broshi to talk further about it

replies.body: But ur main is gold 3. This is like level of my smurf feels bad I do this all the time so fun.

But that has nothing to do with anything, I smurf in gold was all I was saying so I wanted to smurf with this dude but my smurf probably too high so can’t :( 

No need to be rude bud

my dude, you should carry me on your smurf ;) haha, but for real, my smurf isn't even level 30 yet
so if you don't mind playing some normals, I'm more then down for it

yeah man, I'm not looking to climb, just to have fun with like troll picks and troll builds and just fuck around
that's why I didn't specify like specific ranks or anything like that, cause I just don't care
Im silver 1 peaked at plat last season add me lets fuck around
